name: MLCActivationLayer
desc: A layer that applies an activation function to the source tensor and produces an output.

items.name: init(descriptor: MLCActivationDescriptor)
items.desc: Creates an activation layer with the descriptor you specify.

items.name: class MLCActivationDescriptor
items.desc: A configuration object you use to create an activation layer.

items.name: var descriptor: MLCActivationDescriptor
items.desc: The configuration object you use to create an activation layer.
